Williams (Harry E.) Letter To His Grandmother

did.unittitle: Harry E. Williams letter to his grandmother,
did.abstract: Letter from Harry E. Williams to his grandmother, 4 pp, 30 December 1894, regarding school, Christmas celebrations and a skating rink made by local firemen. Harry E. Williams (1879-1972) was a businessman and veteran of the Spanish American War.

bioghist.p: Harry E. Williams (1879-1972) was a businessman and veteran of the Spanish American War.

scopecontent.p: Letter from Harry E. Williams to his grandmother, 4 pp, 30 December 1894, regarding school, Christmas celebrations and a skating rink made by local firemen.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Earl C. Williams, August 1984.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Harry E. Williams letter to his grandmother, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
